#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	
	int t, a, b, c, d;
	
	scanf( "%d", &t );
	
	while( t-- ) {
		
		scanf("%d %d %d %d", &a, &b, &c, &d );
		if( ( ( ( a % c ) == 0 ) && ( ( b % d ) == 0 ) ) || ( ( ( a % d ) == 0 ) && ( ( b % c ) == 0 ) ) )
			printf("yes\n");
		else
			printf("no\n");
	}
	
	return 0;
}
